enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve selecting the first element that matches a CSS query, with expectFirst throwing an exception if no match is found.
Both methods use a CSS query string as input to select elements, though expectFirst specifically looks for the first match.
expectFirst relies on Validate.ensureNotNull to throw an exception if no element is found, indicating a state dependency on validation methods.
The method Selector.selectFirst is invoked before Validate.ensureNotNull, establishing an execution order dependency.
